jason@jasondavies.com.message:
Fix #2040: parsing time zone offsets.

There was a bug when parsing positive time zone offsets with a non-zero
number of minutes: the use of Math.floor on negative numbers rounded in
the wrong direction.  Replacing Math.floor with (x | 0) correctly
truncates positive and negative values.

Workaround for Chrome touchmove issue 412723.

Fixes #2013.

tommy@southdesign.de.message: returning `undefined` rather than `NaN` to comply with d3.mean as @mbostock suggested
reimplemented variance to be calculated incremental using Knuth´s and Welford´s approach
